about.label: About Me
about.brief: A lad capable to turn caffeine into codes.
about.description: Android Developer with over 5.6+ years of experience designing and delivering scalable, high-performance mobile apps using Kotlin and Java. Skilled in Android SDK, Jetpack, MVVM architecture, and third-party integrations. Proven ability to reduce app crash rates, improve performance, and manage complete project lifecycles. Developed applications across various Industry Verticals: Food Delivery, eLearning, Social Media, e-commerce, Fitness, Tech News etc.

items.title: Product Engineer 2
items.description: Experience in integrating Android apps with POS systems. I have hands-on expertise in debugging to improve app performance and add new capabilities. I'm skilled at using tools like Posthog to analyze user behavior, Graylog for monitoring and troubleshooting app performance, and Zenduty for managing critical incidents and ensuring smooth operations. I thrive in Agile teams, where I work collaboratively to drive the development of high-quality, efficient solutions.

items.title: Android Developer
items.description: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Experience with Agile development process.And integrated various Third parties like payment gateways, social APIs, Firebase, Zendesk, CleverTap etc.

items.title: Android Developer
items.description: Worked as an Android application developer with 1.11 years of experience. Eager to support in modernizing world-class products and deliver an incredible user experience.
Being a Computer Science Engineer, I gained vast amount of knowledge even in software and IT industry as well.

items.academy: Haryana State Board of Technical Education
items.description: During this time frame, I have learned basic concepts in better practical way. It gave me wide array of opportunity to work on lot of things.
It was a place where I spent my childhood with new mates while gaining broaden knowledge in last decades.
